description:

title: UX/UI Designer
description:

What you'll be doing:

title: Data Engineer
description:

Responsibilities:
â€¢ Design and implement scalable data pipelines
â€¢ Build and maintain data warehouses and data lakes
â€¢ Optimize data processing workflows for performance
â€¢ Ensure data quality and governance standards
â€¢ Work with streaming data technologies
â€¢ Collaborate with data scientists and analysts
â€¢ Implement monitoring and alerting for data systems

Required Skills:
â€¢ 5+ years of experience in data engineering
â€¢ Expert knowledge of SQL and database systems
â€¢ Proficiency in Python and/or Scala
â€¢ Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Kafka, Hadoop)
â€¢ Cloud platform expertise (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
â€¢ Knowledge of data warehousing concepts (Snowflake, Redshift)
â€¢ Experience with workflow orchestration tools (Airflow, Prefect)
â€¢ Understanding of data modeling and ETL/ELT processes
â€¢ Strong problem-solving and optimization skills
â€¢ Experience with containerization and infrastructure as code
